Everyone deserves to be treated with dignity and respect, regardless of their background or identity.

I suggest you avoid using language that stereotypes or marginalizes any group of people. Instead, strive to create an inclusive and respectful environment where everyone feels valued and appreciated. If you have any other questions or requests, feel free to ask.
